d:
Hi, Here's a translation of bunny girl 18 by Purple haze that's closer to the JP version, and on the high res pics. This one also has the 1131 x 1600 textless images.

Translation: Seagult

Proofreading and Typesetting: Gintokiftw

JP version: https://e-hentai.org/g/3648312/582672e4a9/

Lime's notes: This time, I've drawn Android 18 from "Dragon Ball." This is the third work in her series.

The theme is "Bunny Girl," but the concept is that she's a casino companion.
The story was inspired by the rigged fight scene with Mr. Satan from the original manga.
Initially, there were some unconventional bikini designs, but we decided that "this is what a Dragon Ball bunny girl should look like," so we went with the basic, orthodox style.

The most difficult part of the drawing process was handling the bunny ears. I struggled with how to incorporate the headband into her hairstyle, but ultimately, I decided to just "embed it within her hair."

Please support the official release: https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ01503274.html
n: [Artist CG] [PURPLE HAZE (Lime)] ROUTE 18 Bunny Girl Hen (Dragon Ball Z) [English]
